overview: Getting dumped always hurts. Even more so when your boyfriend has sent his fourteen-year-old brother, Wilbur, to break the news. This was supposed to be Annabel’s year. so why is she sitting here in a restaurant being told by a fourteen-year-old that her boyfriend, Thomas, doesn’t want to see her anymore? But dispensing with Annabel proves a bigger challenge than Wilbur had anticipated...
title: Lunch Date
